TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, you fall asleep for exactly 2 seconds.

 

I wish for this wish to not be granted

The wish is disgranted on user wish.

I wish for my coffee.

Kauphy acquired.

I wish it was Friday today so that I get my good classes with my bad classes, as opposed to all of my bad classes and no good classes

Granted, but all of your bad classes get extended, making you miss your good classes.

 

I wish that the school wi-fi will change that KSP forum will be no longer blocked

Edited September 5, 2019 by Yeet_TheDinosaur

Granted. The school wifi changes to deadly microwave beams that incinerate everything within a 100-mile radius.

I wish I could drift.

Granted you drift under a bus wheel.

 

 

I want a CNC mill

Granted. You have bought a windmill and an abacus.

I wish for moar KSP-2 spoilers.

Granted, but the price have gone up to 100$ and it has more micro transactions then EA games.

I wish I can get out of Australia.

Granted. A new Ice Age freezes the sea around Australia. Welcome to Antarctica!

I wish for Australian-Antarctic penguroo hybride.

Granted, then it eats you.

I wish for a complete set of all elements in the universe.

All of them are teleported to your location. You instantly die of radiation poisoning.

I would like some P̴̪͑a̶̛̳̮̔̀i̸̞̤̔̍n̶̖̫͋̇

Granted. After the universe dies.

 

I want to sleep at night

Granted. I smack you across the head with a frozen salmon.

I wish there was a Teenager / Adult translator. Would make my life easier.

Granted. Now every second word is replaced for you like this forum filter is doing. So, you understand nothing at any side.

I wish the 1,000 gets helloed.

Granted, your eardrums break.

I wish Tweakscale didn't break stuff as often as it does.

Granted. Tweakscale is changed. Now you realize that nowadays Tweakscale breaks stuff rarely.

I wish the ribbons above were aligned.

Granted. They already are.

I wish I could think harder

Edited September 14, 2019 by TheKSPBeginner
E

Granted. Every time you want to think you now have to hit a hard surface with your head.

I wish I had unlimited wishes.

Granted. You have no idea what to use them all for.

 

I wish that I would get over this danged cold before I leave for Florida tonight

Granted. Now you've got a fever.

 

I wish I had a dollar.

12 minutes ago, Dman979 said:

I wish I had a dollar.

Granted. Unfortunately Clint Eastwood shot you and took it back.

I wish I had a few dollars more.

Granted. You also have to give me a dollar back.

 

I wish for a dollar that Clint Eastwood won't harm me for.

Granted. I take it instead.

I wish for RAM.

Granted. What do you plan on doing with your new animal?

I wish for a dollar that I can keep, and that no one will harm me for.

59 minutes ago, Dman979 said:

I wish for a dollar that I can keep, and that no one will harm me for.

Granted. But as soon as you let go of that dollar, they will harm you.

I wish humans could regenerate lost teeth.
